name: Somewhere in space...
description:
Description

The Earth needs you !! Hostile planets attack us ! 

Take  the control of this satellite dish and try to negotiate with them...
Uh... 
You know how to negotiate, right?

This is the first game I made by myself. It was created during the Interface3 "Game developer" training. The purpose of this exercise was to create a remake of  Asteroids (1979). It only take a few seconds to finish.

Thanks to Bastien Gorissen & Thomas Stassin who code the engine.

Controls
  • Use SPACE to SHOOT.
  • Use Keyboard's ARROWS to MOVE.

If you have any advice or suggestion, please write a comment. It will make me happy !

I hope you enjoy the game !
